title: The Great Crime Panic (Is A Lie), It’s Uh Me Mario?? 10.11.22
itunes:title: The Great Crime Panic (Is A Lie), It’s Uh Me Mario?? 10.11.22
description:
In episode 1348, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and co-host of Y'all Gay, Ever Mainard, to discuss…  Crime is So Out of Control that the Data Can’t Even F**king Prove It! The Internet Nailed The Chris Pratt Mario Voice Complaint and more!

  1. Crime is So Out of Control that the Data Can’t Even F**king Prove It!
  2. Myths and Realities: Understanding Recent Trends in Violent Crime
  3. The Internet Nailed The Chris Pratt Mario Voice Complaint

LISTEN: Bahouche by Amaria Hamadalher

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
